classScheduleInformation: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
description: Elementary ballet for dance majors; emphasizes placement, refinement of adagio, pirouette, jumps, and connecting steps. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
label: Beginning Ballet Tech Core
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
